Direct Provision, separation of powers, Offences Against the State, blasphemy... — it's absurd to think democracy is some infinite resource.
Ends goes on tv once a year. Martin is up to his neck in the crash. Gerry is Gerry. Why do we see our system as so robust and unchangeable?
Never mind media capitulation. Think of how unpopular establishment parties are, how poor their leadership and message clarity is.
Hard to overstate how flimsy+unprepared for fascism Irish democracy is. Our paper of record, didn't even put up a fight. Tip of the iceberg.
